name: Boxed In (itch) (FatiguedFox)
description:
-----------------------

Game For [Ludem Dare 50]

Theme: Delay The Inevitable

----------------------

You're in a box, and now you're in trouble. 

Collect Crystals to restrain the ever shrinking cubic room. Delay your own death by squashing for as long as you can! Get a meaningless high score that'll make you feel slightly better before your inevitable death. 

-----------------------------

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Enter or Space to Confirm

-----------------------------

Music Credits:

Road 1 Chill by Komiku: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Helice_Awesome_Dance_Adventure_/road-1...

Road 1 Fight by Komiku: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Helice_Awesome_Dance_Adventure_/road-1...
